comment: The Hilbert lattice satisfies the exchange axiom. Proposition 1(iii) of [Kalmbach] p. 140 and its converse. Originally proved by Garrett Birkhoff in 1933. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
